data.lyric:
[ti:Free Loop (Vocal Up Version)]
[ar:Daniel Powter]
[al:Free Loop]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]Free Loop - Daniel Powter (丹尼尔·波特)
[00:00.02]Lyrics by：Daniel Powter
[00:00.03]Composed by：Daniel Powter
[00:00.04]Arranged by：Daniel Powter
[00:00.05]Produced by：Mitchell Froom/eff Dawson
[00:00.09]I'm a little used to calling outside your name
[00:03.52]
[00:05.97]I won't see you tonight so I can keep from going insane
[00:09.97]
[00:12.75]But I don't know enough I get some kinda lazy day
[00:18.36]Hey yeah
[00:19.71]
[00:25.11]I've been fabulous through to find my tattered name
[00:29.15]
[00:31.38]I'll be stewed tomorrow if I don't leave as both the same
[00:35.32]
[00:38.26]But I don't know enough I get some kinda lazy day
[00:43.51]
[00:44.03]Hey yeah
[00:45.13]
[00:50.55]Cause it's hard for me to lose
[00:52.28]In my life I've found only time will tell
[00:55.41]And I will figure out that we can baby
[00:58.87]We can do a one night stand yeah
[01:01.22]
[01:03.30]And it's hard for me to lose in my life
[01:05.79]I've found outside your skin right near the fire
[01:10.07]That we can baby
[01:11.61]We can change and feel alright
[01:14.05]
[01:19.81]I'm a little used to wandering outside the rain
[01:23.26]
[01:25.59]You can leave me tomorrow if it suits you just the same
[01:29.49]
[01:32.40]But I don't know enough I need someone who leaves the day
[01:38.09]Hey yeah
[01:40.67]
[01:44.75]Cause it's hard for me to lose
[01:46.24]In my life I've found only time will tell
[01:49.54]And I will figure out that we can baby
[01:52.99]We can do a one night stand yeah
[01:55.39]
[01:57.41]And it's hard for me to lose in my life
[01:59.99]I've found outside your skin right near the fire
[02:04.22]That we can baby
[02:05.72]We can change and feel alright
[02:08.09]
[02:38.86]Cause it's hard for me to lose
[02:40.56]In my life I've found only time will tell
[02:43.66]I will figure out that we can baby
[02:47.10]We can do a one night stand yeah
[02:49.60]
[02:51.60]And it's hard for me to lose in my life
[02:54.13]I've found outside your skin right near the fire
[02:58.35]That we can baby
[02:59.93]We can change and feel alright
[03:02.46]
[03:04.35]Cause it's hard for me to lose
[03:06.03]In my life I've found only time will tell
[03:09.11]And I will figure out that we can baby
[03:12.64]We can do a one night stand yeah
[03:15.14]
[03:17.11]And it's hard for me to lose in my life
[03:19.68]I've found outside your skin right near the fire
[03:23.84]That we can baby
[03:25.40]We can change and feel alright
data.trans:
[ti:Free Loop (Vocal Up Version)]
[ar:Daniel Powter]
[al:Free Loop]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.02]//
[00:00.03]//
[00:00.04]//
[00:00.05]//
[00:00.09]我有些习惯了在外面大喊你的名字
[00:03.52]
[00:05.97]今晚我不会来见你 这样我就不会陷入疯狂
[00:09.97]
[00:12.75]但我并不足够了解 我过了些懒散日子
[00:18.36]//
[00:19.71]
[00:25.11]为了找到我残缺的自我 我一直很努力
[00:29.15]
[00:31.38]如果我离开 明天我也是一样 会变得焦虑不安 
[00:35.32]
[00:38.26]但我并不足够了解 我过了些懒散日子
[00:43.51]
[00:44.03]//
[00:45.13]
[00:50.55]因为失去对我来说是很痛苦的事
[00:52.28]这一生 我发现只有时间才能证明一切
[00:55.41]我会找出办法证明我们可以 宝贝
[00:58.87]我们可以共度一夜良宵
[01:01.22]
[01:03.30]这一生 失去对我来说是很痛苦的事
[01:05.79]靠近你的肌肤 在火堆旁 我发现了
[01:10.07]我们可以 宝贝
[01:11.61]我们可以改变 可以过得开心
[01:14.05]
[01:19.81]我有些习惯了 在雨中漫步
[01:23.26]
[01:25.59]如果你也觉得合适 你明天就可以离开我
[01:29.49]
[01:32.40]但我并不足够了解 我需要某个人离开我这一天的生活
[01:38.09]//
[01:40.67]
[01:44.75]因为失去对我来说是很痛苦的事
[01:46.24]这一生 我发现只有时间才能证明一切
[01:49.54]我会找出办法证明我们可以 宝贝
[01:52.99]我们可以共度一夜良宵

[01:59.99]靠近你的肌肤 在火堆旁 我发现了
